mn3:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn3:2.3: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’ti.
mn3:2.4: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, āmisadāyādā bhaveyyātha no dhammadāyādā, tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyātha:
mn3:2.8: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhaveyyātha, no āmisadāyādā, tumhepi tena na ādiyā bhaveyyātha:
mn3:2.12: Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā.
mn3:2.14: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’ti.
mn3:3.1: Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.2: siyā ca me piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.5: ‘ahaṃ khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.6: atthi ca me ayaṃ piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.7: Sace ākaṅkhatha, bhuñjatha, no ce tumhe bhuñjissatha, idānāhaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍessāmi, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessāmī’ti.
mn3:3.9: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.10: atthi cāyaṃ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.11: Sace mayaṃ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:3.15: Yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā imināva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ imaṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:3.16: So taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya.
mn3:3.18: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.19: atthi cāyaṃ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.20: Sace mayaṃ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:3.21: Yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ imaṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:3.22: So taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya.
mn3:3.23: Kiñcāpi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro ca.
mn3:3.25: Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya subharatāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattissati.
mn3:3.26: Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā.
mn3:3.28: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’”ti.
mn3:4.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
mn3:4.3: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn3:4.5: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
mn3:5.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti, kittāvatā ca pana satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhantī”ti?
mn3:5.2: “Dūratopi kho mayaṃ, āvuso, āgacchāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
mn3:5.3: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho;
mn3:5.5: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn3:5.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
mn3:6.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti?
mn3:6.2: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti,
mn3:6.3: yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti,
mn3:6.4: bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā.
mn3:6.5: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.7: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.8: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:6.9: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.10: ‘Bāhulikā ca, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:6.11: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.12: Therā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.14: navā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.16: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.17: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:6.18: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.19: ‘Bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:6.20: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.21: Navā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.22: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti.
mn3:7.1: Kittāvatā ca panāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti?
mn3:7.2: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti—
mn3:7.3: yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahanti;
mn3:7.4: na ca bāhulikā honti, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā.
mn3:7.5: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.7: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.8: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahantī’ti—
mn3:7.9: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.10: ‘Na ca bāhulikā, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā’ti—
mn3:7.11: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.12: Therā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.14: navā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.16: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.17: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahantī’ti—
mn3:7.18: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.19: ‘Na ca bāhulikā, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā’ti—
mn3:7.20: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.21: Navā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.22: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti.
mn3:8.1: Tatrāvuso, lobho ca pāpako doso ca pāpako.
mn3:8.2: Lobhassa ca pahānāya dosassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:8.3: Katamā ca sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn3:8.5: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
mn3:8.6: Ayaṃ kho sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:9-15.1: Tatrāvuso, kodho ca pāpako upanāho ca pāpako …pe…
mn3:9-15.2: makkho ca pāpako paḷāso ca pāpako,
mn3:9-15.5: thambho ca pāpako sārambho ca pāpako,
mn3:9-15.6: māno ca pāpako atimāno ca pāpako,
mn3:9-15.7: mado ca pāpako pamādo ca pāpako.
mn3:9-15.8: Madassa ca pahānāya pamādassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:9-15.9: Katamā ca sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn3:9-15.11: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
mn3:9-15.12: Ayaṃ kho sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
mn3:9-15.14: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
